page.title: 13ALTAMUSKIN POST OFFICE
page.content: Altamuskin P.O. is a sub-office of Sixmilecross, and is an important amenity in an area that has no other business. The present Post Mistress, 'Mary Ann', as she is popularly called says she has been running the Office, a room in her home, since early 1939 when she took over from her Mother-in- law. It has been on that site for over 100 years. She remembers the Phone Kiosk being erected in August 1939. She recalls that a few days later when the phone first rang, the old lady jumped on her bicycle and rode to the 'corn field' where the others were, for one of them to come and answer the phone. The Office has never been busy as it is at the present day. In the good old days you could close the door on certain days, and go out to the fields or go into the village. She loves meeting her customers weekly.
